About the Company: IndusInd Bank Ltd has emerged as one of the fastest-growing banks in the banking sector inIndia.The products & services offered by the company includes Personal Banking-offers a wide range of products and services like deposits, loans, investments, insurance, forex services, demat services, online services and wealth management services.NRI banking - offers money transfer, investment products such as international deposits, mutual funds, online share trading, etc. The bank also offers property solutions and insurance loans.Business banking- caters to SMEs, retail, NRI and other corporates, offering spectrum of products and services.
